PW_REISSUE_MAIL_CONTENTS:
Dear %_NAME_%

Thank you! We appreciate your continouse using KidsUp Service.

There was a password reissue request from %_REQNAME_%.
It does not matter even if you ignore this mail without pressing the link below if the applicant is not the person in question.

When you press the link below the password will be initialized, Please note that changes to reflect the new ones.

The password can be reissued is up to %_EXPIREDATE_%.
This is an automatic reply e-mail.
If you wish to contact us, it will be fine if you can directly reply.
